entities.name: house of gaunt
entities.description: The House of Gaunt is mentioned as a title in the text. It is not explicitly described but seems to be an important location.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is introduced as a character who gestures towards a bowl and then falls through whirling darkness with Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story. He takes a deep breath and plunges his face into the silvery substance, falling through whirling darkness.

relationships.description: Dumbledore fell through whirling darkness with Harry.
Ogden is standing in front of the House of Gaunt, reading a signpost.
